document.full_text: europe's airbus  trailed u.s. rival boeing  in terms of plane orders in the first five months of the year as the companies gear up for their annual battle for customers at this month's paris air show.
document.title: airbus trails boeing ahead of paris air show
lines_and_colors: europe's airbus  trailed u.s. rival boeing  in terms of plane orders in the first five months of the year as the companies gear up for their annual battle for customers at this month's paris air show.
